thread.title: Mystifly and Wooba integrate as Technology Partners
thread.title_full: Mystifly and Wooba integrate as Technology Partners

title: Mystifly and Wooba integrate as Technology Partners
text:
Mystifly and Wooba integrate as Technology Partners 
World Travel Awards nominee Mystifly, the world's largest airline consolidator has integrated with WOOBA web-services to offer Brasil airlines content onto MyFareBox air ticketing platform. Tyller Passagens, based in Sao Paulo is the consolidator supplying this content to Mystifly's customer base across 60+ countries. Sachin Keni, VP of Mystifly LATAM says " Mystifly will be the first travel company to sell AVIANCA Brasil and other special fares like TAM, GOL and Azul consolidator fares to our TMC and OTA customers in the US, Europe, Asia and LATAM markets. We are very excited about our partnership with WOOBA (for technology) and Tyller (for airline content) ." Additionally, WOOBA has also integrated with OnePoint, Mystifly's XML web-services product, to offer 900+ airlines content to the Brasil consolidators and corporates powered by the WOOBA platform. Through the partnership with AirTkt, MyFareBox XML is now live on Ancouradoro and Tyller platforms and is in final negotiations with other consolidators powered by WOOBA platform. 
Thursday, September 10, 2015
